Taylor and Randy -
Trust me - I want nothing more than for this to all go away. For the sake of Card Connect, First Data, Fiserv ... and
especially our families, it's in everyone's best interest to put this behind us. My relationship with Jared, Card Connect, the
Laurers, etc. can be repaired ... but not until this issue is resolved. I wish it was just a bad dream ... but it's not!
As I have stated previously, Shift4 only has two choices: (i) return the money taken by Taylor and Randy; or (ii) we have a
trial. There is no other possible conclusion to this serious issue.
Jared is aware of what you did. Why would two high-ranking, long-tenured senior executives steal the money? Not just
steal the money, but knowingly put yourselves and your company (one that you worked years to build) at catastrophic
risk? Why take the risk of this ending as a trial? It makes no good sense to me, Taylor or Randy.
We're not talking about chump change here ... we're talking about an incredible amount of money; an amount that is far
more than Taylor and Randy have received in income throughout their entire careers. I'm told they have taken even more ...
and I am currently investigating.
I just don't understand why you would do this?
If you had come to Jared and the board, I am 100% confident that a lucrative plan would have been created to reward
you that it would make what you did pale in comparison.
I told Taylor to immediately return the money before this went any further. I told her to handle this with Randy. I
explained that my knowledge of this would "travel fast." She promised me that she and Randy would return the money
without delay; they agreed that they had fucked-up royally. Taylor said, "we need to pray to God that no one else finds
out about this."
I am so disappointed.
J. Christian Gendreau

From: J. Christian Gendreau [mailto:jchristiangendreau@gmail.com]
Sent: Friday, June 14, 2019 9:05 PM

Subject: Thoughts to consider tonight

Jared -
I know that you said that you did not want me advising you, but I feel compelled to do so,
I have great love and respect for you.
With respect to Card Connect, do you have concerns about my ability to operate discreetly and professionally? I get
that Taylor and Randy did something incredibly f**ked up and I have no idea why, but it has nothing to do with me?
I understand that it is extremely embarrassing for you and Card Connect. I promise that I will do everything
necessary to keep this secret. I suspect that there are others at Card Connect that know and have remained silent or;
worse yet, participated.
I have only told [REDACTED] and, for obvious reasons, asked him to pray to God about it.
I am hopeful that a quick and quiet resolution can be achieved -- this is very important for your companies'
employees and the well-being of our families.
I ask you to consider a fresh start, one that puts this behind us. While it is difficult for me to dismiss what Taylor and
Randy did, I can because of my great love and respect for you.

I know that you said that you did not want me advising you, but I feel compelled to do so,
I have great love and respect for you.
With respect to Card Connect, do you have concerns about my ability to operate discreetly and professionally? I get
that Taylor and Randy did something incredibly f**ked up and I have no idea why, but it has nothing to do with me?
I understand that it is extremely embarrassing for you and Card Connect. I promise that I will do everything
necessary to keep this secret. I suspect that there are others at Card Connect that know and have remained silent or;
worse yet, participated.
I have only told[REDACTED] and, for obvious reasons, asked him to pray to God about it.
I am hopeful that a quick and quiet resolution can be achieved -- this is very important for your companies'
employees and the well-being of our families.
I ask you to consider a fresh start, one that puts this behind us. While it is difficult for me to dismiss what Taylor and
Randy did, I can because of my great love and respect for you.
J. Christian Gendreau
